title: Window Bookmark
name: windowbookmark
description: A addon to bookmark a window and all its tabs.
author: Ben Aherne

scripts.test: npm run build && jpm run -b "C:/Program Files/MDP/firefox.exe"
scripts.prsttest: npm run build && jpm run -b "C:/Program Files/MDP/firefox.exe" --profile profs\Test --no-copy
